<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dHcIsBN7AtM&feature=youtu.be]]> Dear Customers,
The AeroWave™ Text & Track <[[https://bendixking.com/en/products/productitems/aerowave-text-and-track]]> is a handheld personal communications device that keeps you connected. It pairs iPhones and Android devices with satellite communication so you can send and receive texts from anywhere in the world. Broadcast your location and set up customizable emergency communication messages. Check weather for any airport and stay connected everywhere you go. AeroWave™ Text & Track is great for backcountry pilots, fire and rescue professionals, and anyone who wants to stay in touch in and out of the airplane.
Visit us in our BendixKing Pavilion in Oshkosh, WI, during EAA’s AirVenture event July 23rd – July 29th to learn more about AeroWave™ Text & Track show specials!
Register here for our free Annual Customer Appreciation Event where you can enjoy food and beverages with our team members while learning about our experimental and certified aircraft solutions.
